about_the_game:
Overcome Three Obstacles and Create Wonders in the Kitchen!

Sense Cook is a game where chaos reigns in the kitchen and cooperation is everything. But things are a little different here: Three characters on your team face different obstacles in life. One can't see, one can't hear, one can't speak. But if you work together, you can overcome these obstacles and achieve a flavorful victory.

Fake Live Streaming, Real Excitement!

The game's fake livestreaming system takes an ordinary culinary adventure to a whole new level. Messages from viewers during the broadcast, special missions triggered by donations, and objectives will keep you on your toes. As you complete missions, characters in your team gain special powers: A character who can't see can see for a moment, a character who can't hear can feel sounds. Dazzle your audience with your performance and climb to the top of the global rankings!

Modes and Challenges

Global Team Mode: Gather a worldwide audience by making clean, fast and delicious food.

Restaurant Mode: Race against the clock to fulfill incoming orders and become the star of the kitchen.

Play Your Game, Impress Your Audience!

Develop a new strategy every time, push your team to the limit and create order out of chaos in the kitchen. It's all in your hands!

Highlights:

3 Unforgettable Characters: Each must overcome a special obstacle and work in harmony with their team.

Dynamic Gameplay: Real-time missions, audience requests and team collaboration.

Different Modes: Whether you climb the global rankings or win the hearts of customers.

Accessibility and Fun: An experience that anyone can play, despite the challenges, but takes time to master.

Ready to test yourself and your team? The kitchen is waiting for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 Quad-Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Have you ever cooked like this? Try to rule the kitchen with three characters who can't see, hear or speak! Sense Cook is a chaotic and fun cooking game for co-op play with friends. With teamwork, manage the chaos and prepare delicious meals!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish
